title: S3 Ep151: Lashon Hara: Monday, September 21st, 2020
itunes:title: Lashon Hara: Monday, September 21st, 2020
description:
• Schitt's Creek Sweeps the Emmys: 'A Night to Remeber,' Daniel Levy Says (PEOPLE), Emmys 2020: See the List of Winners (PEOPLE)
  • Ellen DeGeneres Addresses Controversy in Season 18 Premiere: 'She Didn't Hold Anything Back,' Source Says (PEOPLE)
  • Teddi Mellencamp to be AXed from Real Housewives of Beverly Hills after three seasons after being branded 'boring and stale' (Daily Mail)
  • 'RHONY' appears to have cast its first black cast member, Bershan Shaw (Page Six)
  • Lala Kent and Randall Emmett reveal sex of their first child together (Page Six)
Real Housewives of Potomac Recap
